de.uni_leipzig.mosquito.query

Class QueryHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_leipzig.mosquito.query.QueryHandler

  • public class QueryHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an handler which converts given query patterns into queries with existing values (or if there aren't values) it will be written in a file called queriesWithNoValues There will be only generate queries for a querypattern, until limit is reached
    Author:
    Felix Conrads
